I can see the Voice UI button in top right. Need to open text input to start switching domains.","blocker":"none","expectedSignal":"Text input overlay should appear with a field where I can type my query","confidence":0.95,"type":"key","reasoning":"Opening text input with Ctrl+Shift+K to submit my first query about pump status","key":"Control+Shift+k"}

[Assistant] Action: {"progress":"Pressed Ctrl+Shift+K but text input overlay did not appear. I can see the voice UI button at bottom showing 'Hold Shift+Space to speak'. Need to find the text input button mentioned in instructions - should be a keyboard icon in floating toolbar at right.","blocker":"Text input overlay didn't open with Ctrl+Shift+K. Need to find the keyboard icon button in the floating toolbar.","expectedSignal":"Text input overlay with input field should appear where I can type my query","confidence":0.7,"type":"screenshot","reasoning":"Need to see if there's a keyboard icon button visible in the floating toolbar on the right side that I should click instead"}

[Assistant] Action: {"progress":"Screenshot shows the dashboard with widgets. I can see Voice UI button at bottom and some icon buttons in the top right corner near 'Voice UI (Ctrl+B)' text. There appears to be a keyboard icon and a chat/message icon on the right side. Need to click the keyboard icon to open text input.","blocker":"Can't see element names - Elements list is empty. Will need to try clicking in the area where the keyboard icon should be based on the instructions (floating toolbar at right).","expectedSignal":"Text input overlay should open with an input field","confidence":0.6,"type":"click","reasoning":"Clicking on what appears to be the keyboard icon button in the top right area to open text input overlay","target":{"coordinates":{"x":1360,"y":65}}}

Let me try the correct key combination with uppercase K.","blocker":"Text input overlay hasn't opened yet after 3 attempts. Need to try the exact key combination specified.","expectedSignal":"Text input overlay with input field should appear","confidence":0.8,"type":"key","reasoning":"Trying Ctrl+Shift+K with uppercase K as specified in instructions to open text input overlay","key":"Control+Shift+K"}

If you can't find domain navigation, explore the page structure or check browser console for errors.

Elements list is always empty which means I'm not seeing the actual interactive elements.
